channel.title: Crossbow bolt damage...? 317 Delta
channel.description:
How do I change crossbow bolt damage on 317? The range bonus on my crossbow is insanely high to compensate, but I want to lower it :P
Thank you!

item.title: Crossbow bolt damage...? 317 Delta
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

I’m not a master at 317’s but I think you should go to this guide:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:1, topic:331347”][anchor=post_2][center][size=14pt][shadow=red,left]2. Range Max Hits[/shadow][/size][/center]

Open Client.java and locate

Or

maxRangeHit determines what you will hit on another player.
maxRangeHit2 determines what you will hit on NPC’s.

As you locate those ints, you should see below it a series of itemIds
Ex.

Followed by the calculation that determines the strength of the arrow or weapon.
Ex.

To edit the max hit simply find the Id of the Arrow or Bow you plan on editing, and mess around with the number following it.
Keep in mind that the bow and arrow combined create the max, not just one or the other.[/quote]
and:

IF YOU WANT TO LEARN HOW TO EDIT the bonuses for items like say have dragon chain have +9999 slash bonus, THEN READ ON

1.) open up the item.cfg file from your whitescape folder with notpad.
2.) Ctrl+F type in item you want [you have to use a _ instead of a space][example: Dragon_chainbody]
YOU WANT THE 1st OF THE ITEMS[there will be 2 dragon chains 1st non-note,2nd is a note]
3.) when you find it it should look something like this:

item = 3140 Dragon_chainbody A_series_of_connected_metal_rings. 148195.415050151 148195.415050151
198945.35621087 0 0 0 -15 0 81 93 98 -3 82 0 0 0 0

LEAVE THE LONG #'s ALONE ONLY EDIT THE SMALLER #'s

EXAMPLE:
item = 3140 Dragon_chainbody A_series_of_connected_metal_rings. 148195.415050151 148195.415050151
198945.356210870 99 99 99 99 99 99 99 99

if you want it to have 99 bonus for all the types of bonuses DONT LET THE NUMBERS TOUCH [IF YOUR GONNA GO CRAZY WITH THE BONUSES DONT LET THE NUMBERS TOUCH LIKE THIS]:

99 99 99999999|99 99

and if you mess up then its ok cuz you either reopen it or just remember the #'s are a Tab apart.

Read full topic
